cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tou

sentence.kanji: 私たちはハワイのマウイ島に旅行したの。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha hawai no mauitou ni ryokou shita no
sentence.english: We traveled to Maui island in Hawaii.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanchou

sentence.kanji: この曲は単調でつまらないな。
sentence.romaji: kono kyoku ha tanchou de tsumaranai na
sentence.english: This tune is monotonous and boring.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shunou

sentence.kanji: 東京で五カ国の首脳会談が開かれています。
sentence.romaji: toukyou de gokakoku no shunoukaidan ga hirakarete imasu
sentence.english: A five-country summit is being held in Tokyo.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nayamu

sentence.kanji: 彼は受験のことで悩んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha juken no koto de nayande imasu
sentence.english: He's worried about entrance examinations.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinben

sentence.kanji: 彼は勤勉な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kinben na hito desu
sentence.english: He is a diligent person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuunin

sentence.kanji: 彼は新首相に就任しましたね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shinshushou ni shuunin shimashita ne
sentence.english: He assumed his post as the new Prime Minister.

cards.english: set about a task, enter upon
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuku

sentence.kanji: 今年から新しい仕事に就きます。
sentence.romaji: kotoshi kara atarashii shigoto ni tsukimasu
sentence.english: I'll start a new job this year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genzou

sentence.kanji: このフィルムを現像してください。
sentence.romaji: kono fuirumu wo genzou shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please develop this film.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's souzou

sentence.kanji: そんなことは想像できないよ。
sentence.romaji: sonna koto ha souzou dekinai yo
sentence.english: I can't imagine such a thing.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kishou

sentence.kanji: テレビで明日の気象情報を確認したよ。
sentence.romaji: terebi de asu no kishou jouhou wo kakunin shita yo
sentence.english: I checked tomorrow's weather forecast on the TV.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zou

sentence.kanji: 象に乗ってみたいです。
sentence.romaji: zou ni note mitai desu
sentence.english: I want to ride on the elephant.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuushouteki

sentence.kanji: 彼は抽象的な絵が好きだね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chuushouteki na e ga suki da ne
sentence.english: He likes abstract pictures.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shien

sentence.kanji: 彼の支援がなかったらどうなっていたか。
sentence.romaji: kare no shien ga nakatara dou nate ita ka
sentence.english: What would have happened without his support?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's enjo

sentence.kanji: その国には物資の援助が必要です。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni ni ha bushi no enjo ga hitsuyou desu
sentence.english: That country needs substantial aid.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakusen

sentence.kanji: 彼らは次の試合のために作戦を立てたのよ。
sentence.romaji: karera ha tsugi no shiai no tame ni sakusen wo tateta no yo
sentence.english: They determined the strategy for the next game.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senzen

sentence.kanji: 戦前の生活は今と全く違いました。
sentence.romaji: senzen no seikatsu ha ima to mataku chigaimashita
sentence.english: Life before the World War II is quite different from that of now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatakau

sentence.kanji: 彼は最後まで戦ったよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha saigo made tatakata yo
sentence.english: He fought to the very end.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chousen

sentence.kanji: 彼は新しいことに挑戦している。
sentence.romaji: kare ha atarashii koto ni chousen shite iru
sentence.english: He's trying out new challenges.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's haisen

sentence.kanji: 敗戦の原因は何だろう。
sentence.romaji: haisen no genin ha nan darou
sentence.english: I wonder what caused the defeat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tatakai

sentence.kanji: 長い戦いが終わった。
sentence.romaji: nagai tatakai ga owata
sentence.english: The long battle came to an end.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taisen

sentence.kanji: 大戦で多くの人が亡くなりました。
sentence.romaji: taisen de ooku no hito ga nakunarimashita
sentence.english: A lot of people died in the world wars.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sengo

sentence.kanji: 戦後の日本は混乱していました。
sentence.romaji: sengo no nihon ha konran shite imashita
sentence.english: Japan was in a state of confusion after World War II.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tani

sentence.kanji: メートルは長さの単位です。
sentence.romaji: me-toru ha nagasa no tani desu
sentence.english: The meter is a unit of length.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genshou

sentence.kanji: 村では最近、不思議な現象が起きています。
sentence.romaji: mura de ha saikin fushigi na genshou ga okite imasu
sentence.english: A mysterious phenomenon occurred in the village recently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's inshou

sentence.kanji: 彼から良い印象を受けたわ。
sentence.romaji: kare kara ii inshou wo uketa wa
sentence.english: I got a good impression from him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinzoku

sentence.kanji: アルミニウムは金属の一種です。
sentence.romaji: aruminiumu ha kinzoku no ishu desu
sentence.english: Aluminum is a kind of metal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shozoku

sentence.kanji: 学校では音楽部に所属していました。
sentence.romaji: gakou de ha ongakubu ni shozoku shite imashita
sentence.english: I belonged to the music club at school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuzoku

sentence.kanji: このソフトには色々なツールが付属しています。
sentence.romaji: kono sofuto ni ha iroiro na tsu-ru ga fuzoku shite imasu
sentence.english: Various tools are included with this software.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zokusuru

sentence.kanji: 私は市民オーケストラに属しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha shimin o-kesutora ni zokushite imasu
sentence.english: I belong to the civic orchestra.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gyaku

sentence.kanji: 駅は逆方向です。
sentence.romaji: eki ha gyakuhoukou desu
sentence.english: The station is in the opposite direction.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakarau

sentence.kanji: 親に逆らうのは良くない事です。
sentence.romaji: oya ni sakarau no ha yokunai koto desu
sentence.english: It is not a good thing to disobey your parents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakasa

sentence.kanji: 絵を逆さにしてみてごらん。
sentence.romaji: e wo sakasa ni shite mite goran
sentence.english: Try looking at the picture upside down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakasama

sentence.kanji: それじゃあ上と下が逆さまだよ。
sentence.romaji: sorejaa ue to shita ga sakasama da yo
sentence.english: The way you have it is upside down.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's retou

sentence.kanji: 日本は列島です。
sentence.romaji: nipon ha retou desu
sentence.english: Japan is an archipelago.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yurumeru

sentence.kanji: 食べ過ぎたのでベルトを緩めたの。
sentence.romaji: tabesugita no de beruto wo yurumeta no
sentence.english: I loosened my belt because I ate too much.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yurumu

sentence.kanji: 彼は気が緩んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ki ga yurunde imasu
sentence.english: He's off-guard.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tanjun

sentence.kanji: 彼は単純な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tanjun na hito desu
sentence.english: He's an uncomplicated person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakuban

sentence.kanji: 昨晩の雪がまだ庭に残っている。
sentence.romaji: sakuban no yuki ga mada niwa ni nokote iru
sentence.english: Last night's snow still remains in the garden.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gomen

sentence.kanji: 遅れてご免。
sentence.romaji: okurete gomen
sentence.english: I am sorry I'm late.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's menzei

sentence.kanji: この商品は免税です。
sentence.romaji: kono shouhin ha menzei desu
sentence.english: This product is tax-exempt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's menkyo

sentence.kanji: やっと運転免許を手に入れたよ。
sentence.romaji: yato unten menkyo wo te ni ireta yo
sentence.english: I finally got my driver's license.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genjuu

sentence.kanji: 上司から厳重に注意されました。
sentence.romaji: joushi kara genjuu ni chuui saremashita
sentence.english: I was told off severely by my boss.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotori

sentence.kanji: 誕生日に小鳥を買ってもらいました。
sentence.romaji: tanjoubi ni kotori wo kate moraimashita
sentence.english: I was bought a small bird for my birthday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yakitori

sentence.kanji: 焼き鳥はビールに合うな。
sentence.romaji: yakitori ha bi-ru ni au na
sentence.english: Yakitori goes well with beer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's himei

sentence.kanji: 外から悲鳴が聞こえたな。
sentence.romaji: soto kara himei ga kikoeta na
sentence.english: A scream was heard outside.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nou

sentence.kanji: そのクイズ番組は脳を刺激するね。
sentence.romaji: sono kuizubangumi ha nou wo shigeki suru ne
sentence.english: The quiz show stimulates the brain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yuruyaka

sentence.kanji: ここから先は緩やかな坂になっています。
sentence.romaji: koko kara saki ha yuruyaka na saka ni nate imasu
sentence.english: There's a gentle slope ahead.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tama

sentence.kanji: 彼はピストルに弾を込めたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha pisutoru ni tama wo kometa n da
sentence.english: He loaded the pistol.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hazumu

sentence.kanji: このボールはよく弾みますね。
sentence.romaji: kono bo-ru ha yoku hazumimasu ne
sentence.english: This ball bounces well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bakudan

sentence.kanji: その町に爆弾が落とされたの。
sentence.romaji: sono machi ni bakudan ga otosareta no
sentence.english: Bombs were dropped on that town.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kusari

sentence.kanji: 犬を鎖でつなぎました。
sentence.romaji: inu wo kusari de tsunagimashita
sentence.english: I tied up the dog with a chain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ondan

sentence.kanji: この地方は温暖で暮らしやすいな。
sentence.romaji: kono chihou ha ondan de kurashi yasui na
sentence.english: The mild weather in these parts makes it easy to live here.
